favourite.article: O Lord, Your purpose means everything to me!
TWO KINDS OF WALK -- (i) a daily walk while by the Spirit, and (ii) the marching in military rank by the Spirit. Do refer to new song 407.
We need to learn two kinds of walking by the Spirit for God's expression and representation to fulfill His economy.
Praise the Lord that we are crucified with Christ! Amen! I live in faith!
Not I but Christ! Praise the Lord that now, it is no longer the self, but Christ alone! We need to ask the Lord to crucify our old man with Him, and we can walk with Him in our spirit!

I am crucified with Christ! Gal. 2:20. When Christ first called me...and He never ceased to call me and recover me over and over again. Now, as I do this and that, Lord remind where You're at. You're in my spirit, dispensing grace to me.
It is no longer I who live but Christ who lives in me! ...as I do this and that Lord remind me where You're at, You're in my spirit, dispensing grace to me! :)

Praise You Lord Jesus. Saints I have enjoy this song so much so I translated it to Spanish. Enjoy it. Amen.
Crusificado estoy con Cristo y ya no es yo quien vive, mas hoy Cristo Vive en mi. Y la vida que hoy vivo en la carne,vivo en fe, la fe en el hijo de Dios, Quien me amo y se dio a Si por mi.
1. Por el Espiritu yo ando, pasos doy, ando asi,Senor te amo, Que precioso eres a mi! Mientras ando en mi queacer, recuerdame donde estas, En mi espiritu!, impartiendo gracia a mi.
2. Por el Espiritu yo ando, a la meta hay que marchar; Tu intencion Senor es todo para mi. Todo el yo dejo atras, por Tu iglesia que es Tu Amor, el cumplimiento de Tu economia.
Amen, Amen. I am crucified with Christ.
Praise the Lord that I have been crucified with Christ!
I like this song very much. How wonderful our Christ is.

Praise the Lord that we are crucified with Him. All our burdens, cares, strifes, and worries are crucified with Him on the cross. Praise Him we can walk by the mingled spirit today where He is everything to us!
I just love this song!! Amen!!
Galatians 2:20 is the secret to live with and in Christ.
It is one of my favorites. "I am crucified!" Hallelujah for the Body of Christ on earth today.

Like what the apostle Paul said to himself, "I am crucified with Christ and it is no longer I who live but Christ who lives in me. (Gal. 2:20) Saints, this is the meaning of our Christian life. Our Christian life is a life of dying yet living. Once we die, we live. We die from SELF to live with Christ. Our self must go that Christ will have the way to reign in us. By walking in the mingle spirit step by step and day by day. We must give Him the ground in all our heart!!!! Amen and Hallelujah to Gal. 2:20!
